sentences.en: "How much is he paying you?" — "Oh, five thousand." —"Not bad."
a journey of almost a thousand miles
A thousand pounds worth of jewellery and silver has been stolen.
sentences.cn: 价值1,000英镑的珠宝和银饰被盗。

sentences.en: About a thousand students fought with riot police in the capital.
sentences.cn: 大约1,000名学生在首都与防暴警察发生了冲突。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Four thousand troops have been reorganized into a fighting force.
sentences.cn: 4,000名士兵被重组成为一支战斗部队。

sentences.en: He was one of the few thousand committed Rastafarians in South Africa.
sentences.cn: 他是南非仅有的几千名虔诚的拉斯塔法里教徒中的一员。

sentences.en: More than five-thousand secondary school students have been expelled for cheating.
sentences.cn: 5,000多名中学生因为作弊被开除。

sentences.en: Seventeen thousand Indians live in Arizona on a reservation.
sentences.cn: 1.7万印第安人生活在亚利桑那州的保留地。

sentences.en: The car shattered into a thousand burning pieces in a 200mph crash.
sentences.cn: 汽车在时速为200英里时发生撞车，炸成了数以千计燃烧的碎片。

sentences.en: The paintings in the chapel were perhaps a thousand years old.
sentences.cn: 小教堂里的这些画可能有1,000年的历史了。

sentences.en: The stadium has been fitted with seating for over eighty thousand spectators.
sentences.cn: 这个体育场配备了8万多个观众座席。

sentences.en: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks.
sentences.cn: 需要30万吨谷类补充库存。

sentences.en: To date we have spent eight thousand pounds between us.
sentences.cn: 迄今我们总共已经花掉了8,000英镑。

sentences.en: Two thousand grey seal pups are born there every autumn.
sentences.cn: 那里每年秋天有2,000头灰色小海豹出生。

sentences.en: Up to twenty thousand students paid between five and six thousand dollars.

phrases.tran_cn: 一千零一；许许多多；无数的
n. 千岛汁；千岛酱；千岛沙拉酱

trans.tran_cn: 一千，数千，许许多多，千位数
